function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective risk management in workplace operations","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 spread within the workplace","Mitigation":"Implementing a robust risk management mechanism to address workplace operations during the pandemic","Technologies":"Digital workplace management tools, data analytics for risk assessment","People":"Employees, visitors, and customers in the workplace","Owner":"Facilities management team, top management, risk management team"},{"Description":"Inadequate collaboration between different company segments","Impact":"Difficulty in coping with community measures and arranging employees' working conditions during the pandemic","Mitigation":"Establishing cross-functional collaboration mechanisms and communication channels","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, virtual meeting tools","People":"Representatives from different departments, facilities management team","Owner":"Risk management team, top management, facilities management team"},{"Description":"Ineffective response due to lack of previous experience with risk management","Impact":"Inefficient coping with COVID-19 pandemic challenges in the workplace","Mitigation":"Providing training and education on risk management for workplace operations","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, virtual training modules","People":"Employees, management team","Owner":"Human resources department, risk management team"}]}
